Translations.Text: Otzhe, vin ne maye tovarysha tut
Ne budʹ-yake prodovolʹstvo, krim hirkoho riznovydu
Prodovolʹstvo dlya hrishnykiv
ya prysyahayu shcho vy dyvytesʹ
Ta yaki vy ne dyvytesʹ
Tse yavlyaye soboyu vysliv pochesnoho kur'yera
Ne vysliv poeta; ridko robyty vy vvazhayete
Ne vysliv soothsayer; ridko robyty vy berete uvahu
vidkryttya z Lorda vsesvitu
Mav vin vymovyv budʹ-yaki inshi vykladannya
My by pokaraly yoho
My by zupynyly apokalipsys yomu
Zhoden z vy ne mohly dopomohly yomu
Tse ye reminder dlya spravedlyvyy
My znayemo; deyakyy z vy rejectors
Tse ale hore dlya disbelievers
Tse yavlyaye soboyu absolyutnu pravdu
Tomu, vy budete glorify nazva vashoho Lorda, Naybilʹsh Velykoho
questioner mozhe dopytaty nemynuchyy retribution
Dlya disbelievers, nikhto ne mozhe zupynyty tse
Z BOHA; Possessor nayvyshchoyi Vysoty
anhely, z yikhnimy zvitamy, pidnimayutʹsya yomu cherez denʹ shcho dorivnyuye p'yatdesyat tysyacholittya
Tomu, vy budete vdatysya do dobrozychlyvoho terpinnya
Dlya vony bachatʹ tse daleko
V toy chas, yak my bachymo tse duzhe zakryvayemo
denʹ prybude koly nebo bude lyublyatʹ molten skeli
hory budutʹ lyublyatʹ fluffy vovna
Niyakyy tovarysh ne popikluyetʹsya pro yoho blyzʹkoho pryyatelya
